conclusion: The graph is a position-time graph with position on the y-axis and time on the x-axis.
The graph shows a straight line starting from the y-axis at 10 m/s and extending into the positive time direction.
The slope of a position-time graph represents the velocity of the vehicle.
Since the graph is a straight line, the velocity is constant.
Acceleration is the rate of change of velocity with respect to time.
With constant velocity, the acceleration is zero.
